architectural_notes: Support a deployment workflow that promotes a draft version to live/production.

existing_features.title: Update the frontend so the public site renders the Live website content by default (not the Draft content).
Update the editor flow so it edits Draft content and provides an explicit “Publish” action that promotes Draft to Live, with clear English UI text and confirmation feedback.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a publish flow to promote a draft build to live/production
Add backend support for separate Draft and Live website content states, including APIs to read Live content, read Draft content, update Draft content, and publish Draft to Live.
Implement a conditional Motoko state migration to preserve existing single-version website content by initializing both Draft and Live content from the current stored content on upgrade.

projectName: Add publish flow to promote draft website content to live
